descript.abstract: The Component Soil Moisture table describes the typical soil moisture profile for the referenced map unit component during the month referenced in the Component Month table. The soil moisture profiles for each month, taken as a group of twelve months, describe the representative situation for the component throughout the year.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: The distance from the top of the soil to the upper boundary of the moisture layer.
The distance from the top of the soil to the upper boundary of the moisture layer.
A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Component Soil Moisture table.
The typical soil moisture state of the layer, for the month in question.
The unique identifier of a record in the Component Month table. Use this column to join the Component Soil Moisture table to the Component Month table.
The distance from the top of the soil to the lower boundary of the moisture layer.
The distance from the top of the soil to the upper boundary of the moisture layer.
The distance from the top of the soil to the lower boundary of the moisture layer.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The distance from the top of the soil to the lower boundary of the moisture layer.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
